name: A fortnight in the lives of family De Vriesch
name_original: A fortnight in the lives of family De Vriesch
description:
In this game you will control the lives of a family living in the city of Amersfoort in the Netherlands. Choose what errands they will run and make sure these errands

fit the person's strengths. This way you will hopefully be able to feed your familly
for two weeks.

However, there are troubling times ahead. Rumours of a great plague have recently reached Amesfoort. Manage your clan well and neither hunger nor illness will end them. 

More info:

 food:  The more food icons are showed next to a job, the more food will be earned by doing this job. Food will be used at the end of each day. The family will die if you dont feed them.

coins:  The more coin icons are showed next to a job, the more coins it will earn. Coins are needed for random events and will earn points at the end of the game.

Plague:  The more plague icons, the higher the risk to get the plague from doing this job. 

Good luck!
